description:
Demolition of existing warehouse buildings and construction of 2 residential blocks (46 units) together with live/work block and separate office element (Class B1) (3338 sq.m) with basement parking. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  P001-003, P007-009, P010, P100-106, P005, P006, P200-202, P300, P301,  P400-402, P500, P501 (ALL REV. A).  (LBI REG NO:21141)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
